sarees.name: Silk Saree
sarees.description: Elegant red silk saree with golden zari border, perfect for weddings and special occasions.

sarees.name: Cotton Saree
sarees.description: Lightweight cotton saree in pastel shades, ideal for daily wear and comfort.

sarees.name: Banarasi Saree
sarees.description: Royal blue Banarasi saree with intricate brocade work, a timeless classic for festive events.

sarees.name: Chiffon Saree
sarees.description: Flowy chiffon saree in peach with floral prints, perfect for casual outings and evening wear.

sarees.name: Georgette Saree
sarees.description: Stylish black georgette saree with sequin work, suitable for parties and special occasions.

sarees.name: Kanchipuram Saree
sarees.description: Traditional Kanchipuram silk saree in vibrant purple with golden zari motifs.

sarees.name: Printed Saree
sarees.description: Colorful printed saree with abstract designs, a trendy choice for casual wear.

sarees.name: Designer Saree
sarees.description: Exclusive designer saree with stone embellishments, ideal for high-end fashion events.
